hint: Apply basic predicate pushdown, convert implicit to explicit joins, and pre-filter dimension tables before joining—safe optimizations with minimal risk.
Use CTEs to isolate selective date and dimension filters first, then join with fact table; materialize CTEs only if beneficial.
Pre-filter all dimension tables AND fact table into materialized CTEs, then join—aggressive restructuring to minimize intermediate result sizes.
Decompose the query using CTEs for each aggregate path or apply decorrelation techniques; consider rewriting MIN() operations via window functions or separate subqueries.
